name: Fuzzball's Fortress
description:
Build a fortress to protect Fuzzball from a barrage of spiky balls. If you liked playing with Lego blocks, this one is for you. There are 24 levels for you to attempt, all unlocked and ready for play. Go ahead and build the fortress of your dreams!

Music from https://soundcloud.com/mcfarland-beats

Instructions:

Gameplay is entirely mouse driven.

If you give up or want to try another level, just click on Fuzzball to return to the Level Select menu.

To play:
1) Select a piece from the palette.
2) Place it down on the grid with a LMB click.
3) To rotate a piece, use RMB click.
4) To delete a piece from the grid, use LMB click on it.
5) To start the barrage, click on the Play button at upper right corner.
6) To try another level or give up, just click on Fuzzball.

Help is available in the game. Click on the question mark at the bottom left during play to read it.
